EmailTemplate.description: [BROCHURES]----SEND EMAILS TO CUSTOMERS WITH BROCHURES -DO NOT DELETE-
EmailTemplate.name: _LEAD_BROCHURE_EMAIL_
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Product Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Honeywell, Inc. We hope that you have found aviation at its best with our products. We have attached brochures for your reference. We will contact you to follow up on any questions you may still have and discuss the possible next steps.
Best Regards,
